attributes.action: support unequivocally Alec Salmonds plans to scrap council tax in Scotland and ensure that all scottish constituency MPs do the same then take himself and all of them back to Scotland, where they were voted into office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown needs to start being honest!

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
